name: Bookbound: A Warlock's Tale Act 1
description:
Log Line

A young woman sees her homeland invaded. She decides to make a pact with a spirit entity.

Features
  • 6.7k words
  • One true ending plus three bad endings
  • Witches and Warlocks
  • Dice-rolling mechanic for the old-school RPG feeling
  • A total of 21 different decisions or dice-rolls
  • Female Protagonist
Content Warnings  

Contains strong language, death, blood and topics related to war.

May contain spiders.

Team Members

Created by Mondlichgames
